message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.CR, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the mechanism for detecting anomalies in a large-scale computational advertising platform. The paper focuses on monitoring and detecting changes in the system, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of advertising technology platforms and real-time bidding involves handling large amounts of data, which requires efficient data structures and algorithms, making it relevant to data structures (cs.DS) and databases (cs.DB). The paper also discusses the challenges of monitoring a complex system, which is related to computer security (cs.CR) and systems and control (cs.SI).
